name: Blade Knights
description:
Blade Knights is a game that utilises reaction time and speed to block and attack enemies.

- Every attack earns gold that can be used to upgrade sword damage, reduce cool down in between attacks, increase the damage from support arrow, and recover health
- Bosses are every 10 levels
- As each level progresses, enemies gain more health and give less time to react to their attacks
- There are infinite number of levels

How far will your skills take you?
